import React, { useState, useEffect, Fragment } from "react"; import { Routes, Route, BrowserRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { Disclosure, Menu, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; import { BellIcon, MenuIcon, XIcon } from "@heroicons/react/outline"; import FindProductsService from "../services/find-products-service"; import Home from "./Home"; const App = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [categoryCode, setCategoryCode] = useState(""); const handleInput = (e) => { setCategoryCode({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; useEffect(() => { const user = FindProductsService.getProducts(categoryCode) .then(response => { setProducts(response.data); console.log(response); }); // if (user) { // setCurrentUser(user); // setShowModeratorBoard(user.roles.includes("ROLE_MODERATOR")); // setShowAdminBoard(user.roles.includes("ROLE_ADMIN")); //} }, []); return ( {({ open }) => ( <>
